inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getEmailIdentityMailFromAttributes.

emailIdentity.description: The name of the email identity.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getEmailIdentityMailFromAttributes.

behaviorOnMxFailure.description: The action to take if the required MX record isn't found when you send an email. Valid values: `USE_DEFAULT_VALUE`, `REJECT_MESSAGE`.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

mailFromDomain.description: The custom MAIL FROM domain that you want the verified identity to use.
